ygData.subject: Re: Short Sword of Ykesha spoiler request
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve done the same, but I have gotten resisted once. it wasn t pretty =) (i had forgotten to equip my +cha items!) Jackalx Songweaver Level 50 - Tunare ...
ygData.messageBody:
I've done the same, but I have gotten resisted once. it wasn't pretty =) (i had forgotten to equip my +cha items!)

Jackalx Songweaver
Level 50 - Tunare

----- Original Message -----
From: Greg Gillan <GGillan@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, December 13, 1999 8:24 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Short Sword of Ykesha spoiler request


> From: Greg Gillan <GGillan@...>
>
> At level 50, I'm able to pull singles from the lord room using Kelin's
> Lament. Lull the two boks on the sides, then pull the lord/ph. Haven't
> failed a lull in guk yet, but you might get higher resists at level 46.
> Just take along a lot of charisma.
>
>
> Elwyn Heartstring
> Level 50 Bard of Erollisi Marr
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
> [mailto:Michael.Garramone@...]
> Sent: Saturday, December 11, 1999 11:03 AM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Short Sword of Ykesha spoiler request
>
>
> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
> that cleric of yours is a must. if one of your group is an enchanter, you
> should be good. that way you can fight the ghoul lord alone while his 2
> guards are out of the fight. if you do not have an enchanter, i would
> suggest that you pixie strike one of the guards while everyone else takes
> out the lord. it would be quite difficult, but you could try messing both
> guards, if you can get it to stick. may as well have dirge up, it's only
> 300+ dmg but it enabled my very unbalanced group (i.e. we should not have
> tried it hehe) to kill the lord once. we all died, but we got the sword
> first =) the key is to stagger the spawn. keep the guard you are on messed
> for a couple minutes after the initial fight, if you all survive. most of
> your group should be 45+, not 40+. the lord is 48ish and his guards are
> 45ish, give or take. good luck.
>
> Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
> Tyria Sarkin, L31 High Elf Wizard
> Manda D'ulin, L22 Wood Elf Warrior
> Mithaniel Marr Server
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@... with the subject submissions.
>
